member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.BackwardDiagonal
member.summary: A pattern of lines on a diagonal from upper right to lower left.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Cross
member.summary: Specifies horizontal and vertical lines that cross.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.DarkDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the right from top points to bottom points, are spaced 50 percent closer together than, and are twice the width of ForwardDiagonal. This hatch pattern is not antialiased.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.DarkHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than Horizontal and are twice the width of Horizontal.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.DarkUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the left from top points to bottom points, are spaced 50 percent closer together than BackwardDiagonal, and are twice its width, but the lines are not antialiased.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.DarkVertical
member.summary: Specifies vertical lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than Vertical and are twice its width.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.DashedDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies dashed diagonal lines, that slant to the right from top points to bottom points.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.DashedHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies dashed horizontal lines.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.DashedUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies dashed diagonal lines, that slant to the left from top points to bottom points.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.DashedVertical
member.summary: Specifies dashed vertical lines.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.DiagonalBrick
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of layered bricks that slant to the left from top points to bottom points.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.DiagonalCross
member.summary: A pattern of crisscross diagonal lines.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Divot
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of divots.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.DottedDiamond
member.summary: Specifies forward diagonal and backward diagonal lines, each of which is composed of dots, that cross.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.DottedGrid
member.summary: Specifies horizontal and vertical lines, each of which is composed of dots, that cross.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.ForwardDiagonal
member.summary: A pattern of lines on a diagonal from upper left to lower right.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Horizontal
member.summary: A pattern of horizontal lines.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.HorizontalBrick
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of horizontally layered bricks.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.LargeCheckerBoard
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a checkerboard with squares that are twice the size of SmallCheckerBoard.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.LargeConfetti
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of confetti, and is composed of larger pieces than SmallConfetti.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.LargeGrid
member.summary: Specifies the hatch style Cross.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.LightHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than Horizontal.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.LightUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the left from top points to bottom points and are spaced 50 percent closer together than BackwardDiagonal, but they are not antialiased.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.LightVertical
member.summary: Specifies vertical lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than Vertical.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Max
member.summary: Specifies hatch style SolidDiamond.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Min
member.summary: Specifies hatch style Horizontal.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.NarrowHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are spaced 75 percent closer together than hatch style Horizontal (or 25 percent closer together than LightHorizontal).

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.NarrowVertical
member.summary: Specifies vertical lines that are spaced 75 percent closer together than hatch style Vertical (or 25 percent closer together than LightVertical).

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.OutlinedDiamond
member.summary: Specifies forward diagonal and backward diagonal lines that cross but are not antialiased.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Percent05
member.summary: Specifies a 5-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 5:100.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Percent10
member.summary: Specifies a 10-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 10:100.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Percent20
member.summary: Specifies a 20-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 20:100.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Percent25
member.summary: Specifies a 25-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 25:100.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Percent30
member.summary: Specifies a 30-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 30:100.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Percent40
member.summary: Specifies a 40-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 40:100.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Percent50
member.summary: Specifies a 50-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 50:100.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Percent60
member.summary: Specifies a 60-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 60:100.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Percent70
member.summary: Specifies a 70-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 70:100.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Percent75
member.summary: Specifies a 75-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 75:100.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Percent80
member.summary: Specifies a 80-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 80:100.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Percent90
member.summary: Specifies a 90-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 90:100.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Plaid
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a plaid material.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Shingle
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of diagonally layered shingles that slant to the right from top points to bottom points.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.SmallCheckerBoard
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a checkerboard.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.SmallConfetti
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of confetti.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.SmallGrid
member.summary: Specifies horizontal and vertical lines that cross and are spaced 50 percent closer together than hatch style Cross.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.SolidDiamond
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a checkerboard placed diagonally.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Sphere
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of spheres laid adjacent to one another.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Trellis
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a trellis.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Vertical
member.summary: A pattern of vertical lines.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Wave
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are composed of tildes.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.Weave
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a woven material.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.WideDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the right from top points to bottom points, have the same spacing as hatch style ForwardDiagonal, and are triple its width, but are not antialiased.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.WideUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the left from top points to bottom points, have the same spacing as hatch style BackwardDiagonal, and are triple its width, but are not antialiased.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.ZigZag
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are composed of zigzags.

member.name: F:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.PatternFillType.None
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the right from top points to bottom points, have the same spacing as hatch style ForwardDiagonal, and are triple its width, but are not antialiased.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.Drawing.TextParagraph.Content
member.summary: Gets content.

member.name: T:Independentsoft.Office.FileFormatException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when an input file or a data stream that is supposed to conform to a certain file format specification is malformed.

member.name: M:Independentsoft.Office.FileFormatException.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the FileFormatException class.

member.name: M:Independentsoft.Office.FileFormatException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the FileFormatException class with a specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error

member.name: M:Independentsoft.Office.FileFormatException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the FileFormatException class with the specified error message and inner exception.
member.param: The message that describes the error

The exception that is the cause of the current exception. If the innerException parameter is not a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

member.name: T:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument
member.summary: Represents an Office document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Theme
member.summary: Gets or sets documents themes.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.ContentTypeTable
member.summary: Gets content types table.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.InputFileTable
member.summary: Gets table with all input files. It allows you to get files from the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.CustomFileTable
member.summary: Gets table with documents custom files. It allows you to add files to the document and save them together with document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Category
member.summary: Gets or sets the category of the document. Example values for this property might include: Resume, Letter, Technical Presentation, and so on.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.ContentStatus
member.summary: Gets or sets status of the content. Example values for this property might include: "Draft", "Reviewed", "Final", and so on.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.ContentType
member.summary: Gets or sets type of content represented, generally defined by a specific use and intended audience. This property is distinct from MIME content types as defined in RFC 2616.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Created
member.summary: Gets or sets date and time of creation of the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Creator
member.summary: Gets or sets entity primarily responsible for making the content of the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets explanation of the content of the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Identifier
member.summary: Gets or sets unambiguous reference to the document within a given context.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Keywords
member.summary: Gets or sets delimited set of keywords to support searching and indexing. This is typically a list of terms that are not available elsewhere in the properties.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets the language of the intellectual content of the document. RFC 3066 provides guidance on encoding to represent languages.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.LastModifiedBy
member.summary: Gets or sets user who performed the last modification. Example values for this property might include: A name, email address, employee ID, and so on.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.LastPrinted
member.summary: Gets or sets date and time of the last printing.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Modified
member.summary: Gets or sets date and time on which the document was changed.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Revision
member.summary: Gets or sets the revision number.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Subject
member.summary: Gets or sets the topic of the content of the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the name given to the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version number.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.ApplicationName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the application that created the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.ApplicationVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the application that created the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.CharacterCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of characters in the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.LastCharacterCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the last count of the number of characters (including spaces) in the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Company
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of a company associated with the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.DigitalSignature
member.summary: Gets or sets the signature of a digitally signed document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.DocumentSecurity
member.summary: Gets or sets the security level of the document as a numeric value.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.HeadingPairs
member.summary: Gets or sets heading pairs. Heading pairs indicates the grouping of document parts and the number of parts in each group. These parts are not document parts but conceptual representations of document sections.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.HiddenSlideCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of hidden slides in a presentation document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.HyperlinkList
member.summary: Gets or sets the set of hyperlinks that were in the document when last saved.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.RelativeHyperlinkBase
member.summary: Gets or sets the base string used for evaluating relative hyperlinks in this document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.HyperlinksChanged
member.summary: This element specifies that one or more hyperlinks in this part were updated exclusively in this part by a producer. The next producer to open this document shall update the hyperlink relationships with the new hyperlinks specified in this part.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.LineCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of lines in the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.LinksUpToDate
member.summary: Indicates whether hyperlinks in the document are up-to-date. Set this element to TRUE to indicate that hyperlinks are updated. Set this element to FALSE to indicate that hyperlinks are outdated.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.Manager
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of a supervisor associated with the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.MultimediaClipCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of sound or video clips that are present in the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.NoteCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of slides in a presentation containing notes.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.PageCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of pages of the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.ParagraphCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of paragraphs found in the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.PresentationFormat
member.summary: Gets or set the intended format for a presentation document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.EnableScaling
member.summary: Indicates the display mode of the document thumbnail. Set this element to TRUE to enable scaling of the document thumbnail to the display. Set this element to FALSE to enable cropping of the document thumbnail to show only sections that will fit the display.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.IsSharedDocument
member.summary: Indicates if this document is currently shared between multiple producers. If this element is set to TRUE, producers should take care when updating the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.TemplateName
member.summary: Gets or sets name of an external document template containing format and style information used to create the document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.PartTitles
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of each document.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.TotalTime
member.summary: Gets or sets total time the document has been edited. The default time unit is minutes.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.Office.OfficeDocument.WordCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of words of the document.

member.name: T:Independentsoft.IO.Packaging.DeflaterOutputStream
member.summary: Class Inflater.

member.name: M:Independentsoft.IO.Packaging.DeflaterOutputStream.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, sets the position within the current stream.
member.param: A byte offset relative to the parameter.
A value of type indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.
member.returns: The new position within the current stream.

member.name: M:Independentsoft.IO.Packaging.DeflaterOutputStream.SetLength(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets the length.

member.name: M:Independentsoft.IO.Packaging.DeflaterOutputStream.ReadByte
member.summary: Reads a byte from the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte, or returns -1 if at the end of the stream.
member.returns: The unsigned byte cast to an Int32, or -1 if at the end of the stream.

member.name: M:Independentsoft.IO.Packaging.DeflaterOutputStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads the specified b.
member.returns: System.Int32.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.IO.Packaging.DeflaterOutputStream.CanRead
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports reading.
member.value: true if this instance can read; otherwise, false.
member.returns: true if the stream supports reading; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.IO.Packaging.DeflaterOutputStream.CanSeek
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports seeking.
member.value: true if this instance can seek; otherwise, false.
member.returns: true if the stream supports seeking; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.IO.Packaging.DeflaterOutputStream.CanWrite
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports writing.
member.value: true if this instance can write; otherwise, false.
member.returns: true if the stream supports writing; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.IO.Packaging.DeflaterOutputStream.Length
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the length in bytes of the stream.
member.returns: A long value representing the length of the stream in bytes.

member.name: P:Independentsoft.IO.Packaging.DeflaterOutputStream.Position
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the position within the current stream.
member.returns: The current position within the stream.
